text: Douglas George Smith (19 March 1922 – 1 September 2009) was an Australian rules footballer who played with Collingwood in the Victorian Football League (VFL). == Notes == == External links == * *Profile at CollingwoodFC.com.au Category:2009 deaths Category:1922 births Category:Australian rules footballers from Tasmania Category:Collingwood Football Club players Category:Scottsdale Football Club players
title: Doug Smith (footballer, born 1922)
